constituent: thunder, rain, weather, rice field, brains
heisigStory: The full rumble and roar and terror of thunder is best felt not with your head tucked under your pillow safe in bed, but out in an open rice field where you can get the real feel of the weather.
koohiiStory1: If it´s raining and you´re standing in the middle of a rice field, you´re sure to soon become acquainted with the thunder up close and personal.
koohiiStory2: Thunder is a sure sign of rain coming. When you hear the thunder, you´ve got time to get out of the field before it starts raining.
